## Learning Outcomes {.ch}

After completing Class 9 you should...

* Know the definition/defining equation for algebraic-transcendental equations (ATEs) and residual expressions
* Understand how a numerical ATE solver works and how to use one
* Be able to
    * use the REB assignment workflow to complete reaction engineering assignments involving specification tasks
    * solve a set of ATEs numerically
